I miss my family but I'm grateful for their support.

content.text: I like to garden, and I have a greenhouse. I also enjoy spending time with my family.
That sounds nice. I like to read and watch movies. I also have a dog.
Yes, I have a German Shepard named Oscar.
I love dogs. They're such loyal companions.
They are. Oscar is my best friend.
What do you like to read?
I like to read all sorts of things, but I'm especially fond of historical fiction and mysteries.
I like those genres too. I'm also a big fan of fantasy.
I've never really gotten into fantasy. What do you like about it?
I love the imagination and creativity that goes into creating a fantasy world. It's so much fun to escape into a different reality for a while.
I can see why you like it. I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! I think you'd really enjoy it.
